Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-37891 affecting package python-pip for versions less than 24.2-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-37891 affecting package python-pip for versions less than 24.2-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-pip is earlier than 24.2-2, affected by CVE-2024-37891
